Should you ever need legal services, I highly recommend Whitten Law Firm.  Definitely one of the best!  Shirley Mills

Need a disability lawyer go elsewhere! Rest in Peace Mel.

name: Sunny Slaughter
text: Martin Weinberg has served as our family attorney for more than a decade from family to criminal court cases we have trusted his judgement to navigate us through critical times. He is also a highly sought after civil rights attorney known for his preparedness in the courtroom, and passion for seeking truth and justice against marginalized populations. He is responsive, a man of integrity, character and always professional. If you are seeking a honest and reputable attorney no matter the type of litigation I would highly recommend you consider and contact him first.

resp.text: Thanks. Glad we can  always be of assistance to friends and family.

name: Sonia Irwin
text: I met Martin in the lobby of the Social Security Office of Hearings and Appeals in Jackson, MS. I was alone and scared of what I was about to encounter. I started a conversation with Martin and I told him that I needed representation but I hadn't had any luck getting an appointment with the attorney of choice. I ask Martin to represent me and he accepted. The ALJ sent his assistant out to the lobby to ask me if I would like to postpone my hearing so I would have more time to prepare my case and get an attorney. I signed a contract with Martin that day. He was always available when I needed to talk to him and if he did have a timing conflict, he would always get back with me and answer my questions completly. He was very thorough in every aspect, and he eased my nerves about the whole process. Martin is a super nice person and he is very family oriented , and that says alot about a person's capabilities when hiring an attorney. I highly recommend Attorney Martin Weinberg for all of your legal needs.

resp.text: Wow. What a compliment.  We were honored to represent you and help get the benefits you deserved after  working hard for  so many years.  What a great client.

text: I hired Lloyd & Hogan for a personal injury after being hit by a drunk driver. The folks I dealt with failed to honor their word. Do not take anything said in conversation as truth. Have ALL correspondence done in writing. Agreements we made over the phone were later denied. They agreed to an even split because they could not get more or refused to continue the case. Also, they continually urged me to settle the case for less than what I should have received. I am left with nerve damage in my neck, which causes tremmors in my right hand. The fiirm made out well.

name: Anon 23
text: If possible, I'd give this firm negative stars. I STRONGLY advise you choose a different firm to represent you. They are a very poor excuse for attorney's. They don't care about you as a person or a case and will not devote the attention deserved. I talked to other lawyers in hopes to fire the one I had in this firm and regret every single day for not doing it. The small cost I would have had to pay to switch lawyers at the point I was at in my case would have been worth it because the rest of my life is affected due to the lack of concern and legal advice provided. If I could keep even one person from having been poorly represented by these people it would be worth it. Don't make the mistake I made. Hire Alexander Shunnarah before you throw your case away with Lloyd and Hogan.

resp.text: Anon 23, are sorry that you did not have a good experience with our firm. We have checked our records and do not see any files under your name, but we appreciate you bringing this experience to our attention. If you are willing, please contact us at 205-969-6235 so we can work towards a resolution. We look forward to hearing from you.

text:
DO NOT USE THIS FIRM!!!!

My brother hired Lloyd and Hogan in Birmingham for help with his disability.   He can never talk to anyone and leaving a message is a joke!  His wife has done all the leg work on this case.  He has been diagnosed with Stage 4 Cancer and when his wife finally spoke with his case worker, she was told his court date for February 2019 could not be moved up!!!  OMG...praying he makes it to February.
DO NOT USE THIS FIRM!!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Causey, I am sorry that you have these feelings, but following the receipt of your review we have spoken with your brother and his wife, who we actually represent, and they do not share your feelings. I suggest you speak with them, and if they have any issues they are of course welcome to contact us to discuss. However, according to our clients, they are very satisfied with our services, as well as the timeliness of services provided and the work ethic of all involved in the handling of their case.

text:
They represented my children for an airbag deployment incident that happened at an impound lot which got a settlement for my kids really think it should have been more and I feel they knew they could get an easy win for them but when it came to me they did not want to bother with the hassle of actually having to fight a case that was a little more difficult because the impound lot owner in Calhoun County that committed the incident by slamming my driver door which deployed airbag on me and my kids which also totaled out my truck making me a victim as well there's no reason why I should be compensated as well.
However since the impound owner works with the Calhoun County courthouses and Sheriff's the magistrates at Calhoun County Courthouse would not let me swear a warrant on the owner of the impound lot but then all of a sudden after getting a small claims paperwork to file against them I suddenly have a warrant for assault charges when I never assaulted anybody court systems there would not even allow me to call my Witnesses that would prove that he is a liar and proved that the Calhoun County Court System is unjust but since supposedly I got in a fight with the owner which I never did I only was defending myself and never threw any punches only foul language however they would not represent me for the case

She was organized, precise and understood the proceedure in a way I never could. The judge respected her and her preparedness. I am very pleased with the case we were able to present. ***** five stars all around.

An update.........we won the case. Abbey has  recently started her own firm and I couldn't be more happy for her. Many thanks Abbey Clarkson !!!

name: Miocia Brown
text: I received services from the Birmingham location and would totally recommend Brock & Stout for your bankruptcy needs. Everyone I encountered was very personable and genuine in assisting me. Misty was very knowledgeable and thorough when going over my paperwork and informing me about the process. They give you the option of a payment plan for your court costs and offer the convenience of paying your trustee fee over the phone, avoiding the trouble of having to find parking in downtown Birmingham. They also set up a telephone interview with you prior to your court date with the trustee to go over possible questions they may be asked. The filing fee was also very affordable. See Brock & Stout for your bankruptcy needs and you won't be disappointed.

name: Michael Blackwood
text: They are professional and do a great job of handling your legal needs and concerns and that is what you pay a lawyer to do. I was satisfied with the fact that I felt that I got what I paid for. I have used other law firms in the past for things unrelated to a bankruptcy, so I knew in advance what to expect from a competent, experienced and knowledgeable group of attorneys. They have always handled my legal concerns in a timely, professional and competent manner. They even went above and beyond, on more than one occasion, to assist me and did things for me that I really did feel were outside the scope of what I had paid them to do and I even expected to be charged more for their services and would have been happy to pay additionally for the services they provided to me. That is enough to warrant an excellent referral to the point I would be more than happy to recommend them to all of my friends and family, but that's not where their professional services ended. Truthfully what I am more impressed with and what has meant so much to me personally is the fact they have a "heart". When you get a letter in the mail that you don't understand and need help deciphering the "legalese" you can call and speak to someone like "Morgan". She's not just someone answering their phone. You helped me understand what it was that I got in the mail and set up an appointment to speak to attorney the next day. That all wonderful, but what meant the most was that she listened to me, the struggle I have had since the pandemic and how my financial circumstances have worsened. She helped me relax she offered an ear to listen to me and a heart to respond to me, not as just a client of their law firm, but as a human. She gave me kind hearted conversation that's given me the strength to relax until I speak to the attorney tomorrow. That is priceless! I don't know how you can assign a dollar figure for something like that, but it reinforces the opinion that I sought out the best law firm I could find to help me with this matter and "Morgan" cemented the opinion to me that I made the right decision. If you need a lawyer to handle your legal affairs, that watches out for your best interest, doesn't charge you again to assist you you when you have additional needs that arise out of your bankruptcy and most importantly to me, has your back and cares about how this is impacting your life and you emotionally, call Brock and Stout. They will take care of you professionally, legally and in my case emotionally when I absolutely needed it the most; you won't regret your decision. I never leave reviews for companies because I am usually so busy. Today "Morgan" just went so far out of her way, not just to answer the phone, not just to help interpret the letter I received in the mail, not even to set up a much needed appointment with the attorney; she helped me moby listening and having a heart so I can continue to make it through this very stressful time in my life. In the midst of all my financial struggles and hardship God has a plan and I know that calling Brock and Stout was part of that plan.

name: Sun Shyne
text:
Attorney Janet Cox of Cox Disability Law, LLC represented me on my appeal hearing.  I'm 48 yrs old and I felt that my case was going to be a difficult one to prove. There were 2 reasons why I thought the judge's decision would be unfavorable; my age and my disability weren't supported by any medical documentation, such as X-ray's, CT-scans, Ultrasounds. Plus, the treatment for my condition was the cause of my condition. I was suffering from other conditions that had been documented over the years by several physicians in various disciplines. Atty Cox wanted to focus primarily on Abdominal & Pelvic Adhesive Disease as the culprit, and casually mention the other conditions. Yes, I was concerned with her thought process due to the fact this condition had the least amount of supporting medical documentation. In that moment I agreed, she was the professional and because she had worked for the  Social Security Administration in the administrative law division.  It was called the Office of Hearings and Appeals at the time.  She had received extensive legal training on the Social Security Act and the Code of Federal Regulations. Also, she had received medical training to learn medical terminology, as well as about injuries and disease processes that can interfere with a person's ability to hold a job. We filed my appeal July 2016 and my hearing Sept 2018. During the hearing with ADJ the ruling was favorable. I haven't seen a dime yet but I know it's coming. Attorney Cox's and her team knows their stuff, trust them and they will get it done for you. Anytime I felt unsure I would call or email, they always replied timely. Also, you as a client have to be thorough in making sure that the physician has noted your conditions in your medical file and request a copy of medical notes, lab reports and any tests that are taken for your personal file and make copy for attorney. Remember you are your best advocate for your disability ...Thank you!
-Tanya
Birmingham, AL

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind review. I have successfully represented a client with your same issues just last month. Very difficult medical conditions to live with. You handle your struggles with tremendous grace. I wish the best for you in the future!
Janet Cox

name: Grant Owen
text: I wouldn't recommend this law firm to anyone. I have an SSI case that I contacted Mrs Cox about, after speaking to her on the phone she explained that she would be sending me a new client packet. She explained how important it was that I get that packet back to her immediately because of the 60 day deadline to file the appeal. She never sent the packet and wouldn't respond to my email. Where I have a real problem is that all she had to do is respond and let me know that she didn't want the case. But she was not professional enough to at least tell me that she wouldn't be taking my case so i could be looking for another attorney before my deadline. I hope this review helps other people when they are looking for a disability attorney.

resp.text: Mr. Owens,  I did want to help you. My records show a message from you came in  at 9:00 PM on Thursday , Feb. 1st. I emailed you and called you on Friday, Feb.2nd. After we spoke, I opened a file and put your appeal deadline of March 27th on the calendar.  We mailed your documents on Wednesday, Feb. 7th, the 3rd business day after we first spoke. I see you posted this review on Friday, Feb. 9th.   I am  sorry for any misunderstanding and wish you the best of luck with your case. Jan Cox

It's extremely gratifying to see the cases through to a successful outcome. Again, many thanks, Jan

name: Pretend
text:
My mother had applied for disability from 2012, and was denied multiple times over many years. We felt we had attempted every avenue to get her approved, with no success.
Shortly after, in 2015, we came across the Cox Disability Law Firm. We reached out to Janet Cox and expressed our problems, and what all we'd been through attempting to get my mother approved, and she immediately went to work. She was very thorough, precise, and caring in her work. She made sure we were always up to date on what was going on with my mothers case, and showed so much more interest and care than anyone else we'd worked with over the years. Only a year and a half later, June of 2017, she was able to successfully get my mother approved for disability. I cannot express in words how much my mother needed this, and how thankful we are to Janet Cox for her didication and hard work. I highly recommend this law firm to anyone and everyone who feels they are at a dead end with their struggles, and even those who are not. My mothers life is inifinetly easier now, all thanks to the Cox Disability Law Firm.

resp.text:
Thank  you for your post. I am glad your mother is feeling some relief now that her claim has been approved.

Stories like your mother's are the reason I practice this area of law. Social Security Disability is such a vital and important benefit for those who need it.  I am thankful to be in a position to help others.

Best regards to you and your mother.

name: Warren Baker
text:
“Very professional and focused on providing me with personal support".  I reviewed several disability law firms in the Birmingham area. Those firms made me feel like I was just another case. I made my decision to select Cox Disability based on the initial phone consultation.  Ms. Cox explained the SSDI requirements and processes in a clear and precise way that I could understand.  Ms. Cox and the staff members helped me with the filing process.  They knew what documentation and required paperwork I would need. They provided excellent support helping me to complete the SSDI forms and answering the questions about my disability. Most of all they took the time to guide me. They were responsive to my emails and phone calls. I always felt comfortable with “How” they managed the process.  I was approved for SSDI benefits and it was because of the support from the associates, their knowledge of the paperwork, and the level of comfort I had during the whole process.  I give Cox Disability 5 Stars.
WB- Chelsea, Alabama

resp.text: Warren, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review for Cox Disability Law.  I am extremely pleased we were successful in your case.  I appreciate your choosing my firm and giving us the opportunity to represent you.  Best regards, Jan Cox

name: Kendavius Fluker
text:
Where do I began......
One of my biggest problems is having a lawyer that you never have seen, a lawyer that you have to tell the same things over and over to yet, she take her time gathering this things are suggesting I see other doctors for the problems at hand.
Then I received a call to come to the office the day before my court date for the very first time in which I still never met Mrs. Cox. At this time I met with a guy in which I will not say his name. Once I began to get upset about some of the things that were not correct, his only response to me is would I like to find another attorney one day before court mind you. After coming for court my lawyer spoke up for me in no manner. This was the worst two years I've had thos far.

name: R. Gentry
text:
After several years of declining health issues, then getting laid off after 20 years of service because of my health, I found myself in dire straits as my allotted 6 months of unemployment benefits were being consumed every week with no hope insight.  I finally came to the realization that I had to take evasive action to secure my financial future or loose it all.  With an unimaginable problem laying ahead of me I knew that I had to put my trust in the hands of The Good Lord who then led me to the internet and eventually to the Cox and Reynolds web site where I then called and with one of professional staff members who helped me, step by step fill out the required Social Security Disability claim for
After the preliminary Claim form was completed and emailed to The Government, i knew that I had taken the appropriate action to save my family and their home.

Two and a half months after my initial inquiry and form submittal, The Government approved 100% of my Social Security Disability  clam which is almost unheard of from a time perspective.

Yes, Thanks to The Cox and Reynolds Legal Team,  Cox and Reynolds K over 60 years working Social Security Disability experience  and weekly discussion with The Firms professional staff, my family and my house has been saved from Foreclosure and Bankruptcy.

Thanks Cox and Reynolds... Job well done!!

R. Gentry

resp.text:
Dear R. Gentry:

Thank you for your positive review and the opportunity to assist you in your time of need.

Sincerely,

Jan Cox

name: Melissa Ann
text: Kevin Green won my case! I have an illness that is very difficult to prove an inability to work. I contacted many attorneys who for that reason refused to take my case. One of them recommended Kevin Green. I was really losing hope of getting the help I needed by the time I contacted him. He met with me personally within a week of contacting him, evaluated my case and agreed to help me. I was very impressed with his knowledge of the way the system works.He got me a an expedited hearing (you must meet qualifications) and when my doctor's office wouldn't send record copies to Social Security, Mr. Green went above and beyond to get what we needed. He came into court prepared and determined. I met him feeling I had little hope of getting the help that I needed, but he took on the challenge when others wouldn't and won the case for me. If it weren't for him, I would still be dealing with my illness without insurance or proper medical care. I have a lot of gratitude and respect for him. I highly recommend Kevin T Green to anyone I meet who needs a disability attorney.

name: LeM
text:
I would give this office a ZERO if I could!!
My ex and I went into an UNCONTESTED adoption and this was starting in Aug 18’ and it finally went to court middle of Dec 18’. The incompetence, unresponsive, lack of follow through and  disrespectful asstistant and lawyer are the issues. I received attitude that was unjustified when I called for my updates when they said they would call. Due to my ex paying for said adoption they used profanity at me and said we will speak to our client, do not call us anymore! That was ridiculously unprofessional!  I have been nothing but truly helpful and the only time I got true updates was when I went in person! I gave 99.9%of all documents required. Any update you ask for or they offer will not happen.

My child was born out of state and we are trying to get them to send the necessary papers out to get a new birth certificate issued and I’ve gotten the biggest run around! They even told me to do it myself when they were paid to do this service! I respectfully stated that they had from August to get this sorted and asked why it was taking so long and that’s where the assistant “Toni” used profanity then assumed to go onto a rant and hung up on me because I asked a simple question..if that shouldn’t throw a flag idk what would. They point blame and don’t take responsibility for their shortcomings and bill for service that shouldn’t have to happen! DHR lost the papers...”oh I’m not sure when I can get to it” ...they are a joke! When the court hearing happened they didn’t even have all the papers necessary even though we showed up prepared! And getting our copies of said papers took even longer! “Oh he hasn’t checked the box”
Their office is legit across the street from the court house! Please I urge anyone who might stumble upon this DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME and MONEY with this poor excuse of a legal office! I’ll be happy to answer any and all questions y’all have :) please make good choices when selecting a good lawyer!

name: Marie Taylor
text:
I had the pleasure of retaining Ms. Donohoe through a personal referral. This was a complex personal injury case which could have been drug out for years. From the on-set, I found her to be very professional and focused on my needs, not her potential profit. Her level of knowledge, detail and preparation was very impressive. She did not leave anything to chance. She actually examined every possible piece of evidence, spoke with multiple witnesses, and even compiled a comprehensive matrix to determine future medical costs that I will no doubt have to address for a long period of recovery. Again, very impressive and thorough!

Ms. Donohoe, and her staff, made me feel at ease, and very confident that I would prevail in my case. And, I did. In a short time, and without court, she was able to secure a significant settlement that now I can rest knowing that I can cover all of the many medical expenses ahead. Now, I don't have to worry about the career I lost because of extended hospital stays and many, many medical appointments. I don't have to worry about losing my home, my car, my self worth. Because of Cathy Donohoe, I WILL SURVIVE! I will have my life back!

Would HIGHLY RECOMMEND this attorney and her entire team!

name: Lori Norris
text:
Hi, I’m Lori Norris. My brother, Jeremy Jerry  was charged with capitol murder charges. Dani V. Bone and Sam Bone Attorneys took his case. They are father and son.
Right from the start they were friendly and professional. They got my brother to be evaluated at Taylor Hardin Secured Medical Center. That is a much nicer place with someone with a mental illness. You got to visit for 2 hrs on the weekends in person. He was going to stay there til his trial. He had several competency hearings. He wasn’t competent. His trial was set for May. We were all grieving and sad. I love my brother no matter what. Then in April I got a call his trial was canceled. He failed his last competency test. I was happy. My brother Jeremy Jerry was going to live in a group home for the rest of his life. With competency hearings every 6 months. He could live somewhat of a life.♥️🙏

If you didn’t read anything else. Dani V. and Sam Bone are great, kind and friendly attorneys. They are professional and work hard to get the job done. They are kind and friendly but they also kick butt! I never thought this would be possible! I am grateful for them the rest of my life. Thank you Dani V. Bone and Sam Bone. I will come to you if I need an attorney in the future for sure.

Lori Norris

name: Kathy Johnson
text: Divorce is HARD no matter if you want it or not, I don't wish it on anyone. When I was faced with mine in 2019, I was referred to Dani Bone through a coworker and friend that I trusted. I initially hired Dani because I heard he was the very best and he would fight for me. I called and even though they were extremely busy, they saw me right away. After hearing my situation, Dani was honest with me and said, "You need Sam. " My case was very complicated having both personal and business issues, assets and properties to divide, custody and other court issues . Sam took it as a challenge. He stayed with me and guided me through the whole divorce process. It was not easy, it was extremely tough but Sam knew how to handle every situation that came up. When going through a 2 yr battle, you need to know and  feel confident that your attorney has your back and has your best interest at heart. I emotionally fell apart many times and he helped me to learn to stand up for myself and it made me a stronger person through this process. All I wanted was what was fair- he got me exactly what I asked for! I was extremly pleased with services of Sam, Dani and their dedicated and caring staff. Amanda, Fredrick and Osha were just wonderful to work with. The whole staff made me feel comfortable and at ease through a very uncomfortable life circumstance.  While the other party had 5 attorneys through the process , I had one.  I only needed the one team- I had The Best with Sam & Dani Bone. Sam was honest, upfront, bold and encouraging. He never had to be ugly or raise his voice in court or trial and never once belittled anyone. I recall him saying, "It doesn't have to be ugly". Being a Christian, a professional, a self employed woman, a Realtor and a mother of 2, this was imperative to me. Sam treated both parties with total RESPECT always . That was very important to me.  I did my part and provided the true facts, evidence and proof- he did his part and presented my case with true professionalism , Integrity and no one was disrespected in the process. I would 💯 percent recommend Sam & Dani Bone if you want to be represented by someone who will always have your back and is not afraid to fight for your best interest. Thank you Sam, Dani, and your amazing team. If I ever need attorney services in the future , I will use you again and will highly recommend you to anyone that I know. You Rock!

name: Bernadette Wineman
text:
Earlier this year, I found myself in need of a divorce attorney when my ex petitioned to modify our final judgment. I no longer lived in Alabama and was unsure of where to turn for legal advice. After consulting with Mr. Sam Bone, it was clear that he had a deep understanding of law and how it applied to my particular situation.

Many attorneys will promise the moon, without being able to deliver a star. Sam will be honest about your case, talk with you about the possibilities, and develop a plan to protect your best interests. Phone calls/emails are answered promptly and you are made aware of appointments and court actions. Even though my case was regular family law issues, it was treated as a priority.

When emotions run high and people play dirty, you need an attorney that will keep you focused. It was nothing short of a blessing to have Sam’s counsel during this time. Sam will listen and use what will benefit your case most, helping you to make the best decisions.

Through my experience, I learned that Sam is wise beyond his years and holds a unique combination of qualities that make him an excellent attorney. He is a younger lawyer in comparison to many of the veterans in the area, but his expertise speaks through shrewd discernment, both in and outside the courtroom.

In retrospect, I know that employing a professional, well-versed attorney who gave honest legal advice was a valuable asset to me. My case only involved family law, but I would recommend Sam Bone in every area that he practices. My children and I are thankful for the Bone Law Firm.

name: Tara Davenport
text:
In December 2015 Jim Pino was referred to me by a family friend, also an attorney and who’s advice and opinion matter greatly to me.

I needed an attorney who would fight for me. To help and advise me with a divorce after 23 years of marriage. I knew going into it that it wasn’t going to be anywhere close to pretty, much less easy for a multitude of reasons. But I also knew that I had “hit my wall” and it was necessary. I also knew that I was going to have to have an attorney that would work with me, not just for me. I had been married since I was 21.... nothing about anything was easy and I was terrified about everything.

And that’s exactly what Jim did for me.

Jim and his amazing staff helped me through one of the hardest times of my life and helped me find myself again.

I would and do, recommend Jim Pino & Associates to any and everyone who asks.

Thank you Jim and thank you to your awesome staff!!

name: Gordon Madden
text: There is not enough space to share my experience with Jim and the entire staff. They have worked with me for over a decade (11) years. Almost daily, many nights, weekends even when they've been on vacation. Never once failing to jump up to the emergency, or simply to make sure my son was protected. Because of Jim and his family, staff and associates, I have been given the opportunity to have a wonderful relationship with my little boy. He's stood in my defense against 17 different lawyers, sometimes 5 against 1. His son has stood with me as well. We've had multiple trials, most recently he postponed major surgery and suffered through a 4 day trial. Agonizing in Pain against 4 very reputable lawyers. Not to mention, he did this for 1/5 of the money the other guys were being paid. He did it because he cares and felt that it was in my son's best interest and we'll being. Just today, our order was issued. Once again, his hard work and character and one of a kind skill prevailed. I still have sole custody and I am assured a meaningful relationship with the most important thing in my life. I can never repay Jim for his decade long dedication to making sure we're protected. If you need help, a brief visit with him will reveal the true character and heart he puts into making sure justice prevails. My name is Gordon Madden and I would be happy to share my story with you.

text: I can not start to use any word or words to express my gratitude and love for this Company! Starting with Nicole, and then Fred. I suffer a multiple of thing including multiple personalities. If I was having a bad day, I would call them and cry , and put Nicole through a heavy load, and every time, though busy she listened to me. One point I said I was firing them(for no good reason, other then I was having a bad day), I didn't give her a chance to rebuttal. I received a phone call the next day from FRED, and I tore into him before he had a chance to address me. He too had the soothing voice, and caring attitude, and was able to bring me to reality, so I didn't fire them. I since, have developed one of the best relationships I have ever had with a lawyer, because of his dedication, support, expertise, and will- I won my case, and I am now SSDI approved! Look no further- he's got you! CALL THEM- LIKE ME you can win too!

name: Mark J Jones
text: Becoming fully disabled is no joy for anyone and when it happened to me last year, it was life changing and stressful. I had worked for over 40 years and trying to adjust to being home all day and learning to manage severe pain was almost more than I could handle. Fortunately, I have a great family and church support system for all of that. However, dealing with arranging and establishing my long term income was a stress factor I had no idea how to handle especially not knowing what was required. Even when my long term disability insurance company recommended that I use the Friedman Law Firm, I was concerned with how much it would cost me and how much interaction it would take to get them all the information they would need. I was so pleased and relieved with the whole process. Friedman was very sympathetic and understanding of how much pain I was dealing with. They only asked of me what they absolutely needed to. They made contacts with doctors and therapists directly as needed to put my case together. I was very impressed with how promptly and completely they took care of getting my Social Security Disability approved and the amount that I was approved for. I don't know why anyone would want to go through that process on their own. I would highly recommend using the Friedman Law Firm. I am so grateful that I did.

resp.text: Mr. Jones, thank you for you review. It is our job to help you through the process and ease your mind along the way. We are glad you felt taken care of!

name: alyssa jones
text:
Hello. I am from Mobile, Al. I first looked for a local attorney around my area and was told that they would not take my case for one reason or another. My disability was very focused, at first, on 1 main thing. Long term side effects from a medical treatment i had gone through and never came back from! I did NUMEROUS searches for attorneys that specialize or are knowledgeable in my particular case/medical conditions. I first hired a firm from up north that will take about any case, but you never get a straight answer. they could not even tell me why after my original denial, I wasn't getting a "reconsideration" phase before my hearing..which i never had to attend BTW ( we won my case without a hearing and by records alone and dr "testimony").The moment the legal "team" could not answer that question, i went back on a mission. I came across Friedman Law Firm.  It never mattered to me that my attorneys were in state or out of state. with technology today,most everything can be done through a phone call, conference call, or via email and internet. The days of going in and sitting down with your attorney face to face is still common,but absolutely not necessary. Believe me when i say that I feel like I know my paralegal and Jessica Friedman personally, but we have never met! Going back a minute, I ended up calling and speaking to a paralegal from Friedman Firm who answered my question about the reconsideration phase in the first 5 minutes!!The other firm hadn't called me back with an answer in days! After that, She got a lot of info from me, went and spoke with Miss Jessica about my case. She had more questions. I answered. the poor paralegal went back and forth a few times that day, but at the end of the day I had fired the previous firm and KNEW I WAS IN THE RIGHT HANDS NOW. Even with the long distance between our cities.
I have NEVER EVER, NEVER not gotten a return response by my legal team- either called back or emailed! I was a nervous wreck through my whole case, but they were as cool as cucumbers!! name: Dawnelle Kay
text: During the onset of my divorce, I felt lost and overwhelmed. I googled lawyers and FAQs, anything to help me figure out what my first step needed to be. I found Adam Jones and Associates and while looking over their website, a chat popped up asking me if I needed to chat with them. I figured it was some ploy or scam to get my name and number that would lead to a flood of annoying calls, but I decided I had nothing to loose, so I chatted about my situation. It turns out, I was chatting with my future lawyer! That same week I met Niki and as soon as she shook my hand...I knew she was the answer to my prayers. Hands down, an amazing woman and a powerful lawyer. After my divorce, I brought the company I work for to Adam Jones and Associates. I can honestly say, on a personal level with my divorce and on a professional level with the cases I deal with at work, Adam Jones and Associates is my lifetime firm. One chat session lead to one phone call, one hand shake lead to one case, and now they are my lawyer, my family's lawyers, and my company's lawyers. They really do cater to their clients needs. I can not express my support for this firm enough! I remember emailing my lawyer at 3am and she was not only there for me legally, but as a friend as well. That is what makes me a forever customer, knowing my problem is not a paycheck to these guys, it is their problem too and they mean it.
